Description: The following statement contains a magic number: return app =>              {                  if (!_hostEnvironment.IsDevelopment())                  {                      app.UseExceptionHandler("/Error");                  }                    app.UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute("/Error/{0}");                    app.Use(async (context' next) =>                  {                      await next();                        if (context.Response.StatusCode < 200 || context.Response.StatusCode >= 400)                      {                          if (_contentTypeProvider.TryGetContentType(context.Request.Path.Value' out var contentType))                          {                              var statusCodePagesFeature = context.Features.Get<IStatusCodePagesFeature>();                              if (statusCodePagesFeature != null)                              {                                  statusCodePagesFeature.Enabled = false;                              }                          }                      }                  });                    next(app);              };
